title: 03/18: Free Agency is Awesome! (Fantasy Football Today)
description:
There is so much to analyze after the first week of free agency. We start with Superlatives (4:48) including Best Signing or Trade, Worst Signing or Trade, Most Confusing Signing and more. We get into the Golden Tate, Tevin Coleman and Mark Ingram transactions and discuss how Tate's addition impacts Evan Engram (12:32) ... Comparing Ingram to some other exciting Fantasy RBs (17:51) and debating what we expect from the SF backfield (21:55) with Coleman aboard. Was this a terrible signing for every SF RB's Fantasy value? ... Touching on the Tyreek Hill news and Kareem Hunt suspension (28:00), more rankings debates (35:00), a breakdown of the NO offense with Latavius Murray (43:10) and notes from around the NFL you may have missed ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Mark Ingram, Latavius Murray, Golden Tate, Ryan Fitzpatrick, Tevin Coleman and more from an exciting week of free agency.
